AdditionalFields.Value: Radiation Science and Medicine,Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science

Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by Drs. Fei-Fei Liu and Steven J. Chmura, Chairs of the AACR Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group. The 2024 RSM Town Hall will feature three presentations from experts in the radiation science and medicine community on the theme of "Language Models, Processing, and Deep Learning in Radiation Oncology, the New Frontier" followed by a panel discussion. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM07. Language Models, Processing, and Deep Learning in Radiation Oncology, the New Frontier: A Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group Town Hall Meeting
Title: Language Models, Processing, and Deep Learning in Radiation Oncology, the New Frontier: A Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group Town Hall Meeting
